title: ezhundhiru kalyANi
sahitya:
ezhundiru kalyANi Om shuddha sattiyam idayattil upa shAnta udayattai tUNDi



anupallavi



azhundiruL ozhindiDac-cenjuDar pozhindengaL AdhArak-kamalattin

mIdErip-pozhindiDa



caraNam 1



viNmukham kanindadu viDindadu kAlai vIngiruL aghanradu tUngina

kumudam

taNmukham aruNat-tazhal mukham Anadu taDangaLiL virindena tAmarai ellAm  



caraNam 2



maNmukham puduppagham pon mukhamAgiDa mangalac-cengkadir

malarndadu vAnil

emmukham pArttaruL purivaderkkeNNi ezhundaruL iddinam inbak-kozhundE



caraNam 3



Arvamennum sEval kUvudum aruLai anbuLLam pADudun Adalin poruLai

kArvarak-kANum kalAbattai pOlun karuNai mukham kaNDu kaLittaden kaNNE



caraNam 4



sUriya jyOti shEr tArakai pOlun shuDarinil onrAgum sukhanilai

taruvAi

pArellAm un mukham pArttiDa aruLAi parama shivAnandam pAlikkum tiruvE
